desc: Set mode for channel. Default, bot is disabled in every channel.

Channel modes. Here is all the modes:
`disabled`: Chatbot will be completely disabled on that channel.
`active`: Chatbot will answer all the messages on the channel.
`ping`: Chatot will only answer if the bot has pinged in the message.
`half active`: Only answer half-active tags. For example it will answer messages like 'hello' or 'goodbye' but not answer 'what is your name?' etc.
`default`: Will answer if the bot has pinged in the message and also answer half-active tags even if bot did not pinged.
